2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Andre, the League's reigning champion has pulled out all the stops and hosts the draft in Las Vegas. Jenny wants to be in the League this year, and when one member drops out she throws her hat in the ring.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: The terrible reign of Ruxin as League Champion continues while the guys devise a grand plan with Rafi and Dirty Randy (guest star Seth Rogen) for Andre's final Sacko punishment.

imdb.plot outline: The League is about a careful young man, Ben Porter, who finds himself at the threshold of becoming a dad. He takes no risks except that in his Fantasy Football League. Finding himself in debt and wondering how to become a good father, he is propositioned by a multi-millionaire to run his fantasy football team. Outside his comfort zone, Ben must make the choice to play it safe or take a risk. Season 1 goes on this both comedic and dramatic journey with Ben to discover what he decides and why he does so.

Finding himself in debt and wondering how to become a good father, he is propositioned by a multi-millionaire to run his fantasy football team. Outside his comfort zone, Ben must make the choice to play it safe or take a risk. Season 1 goes on this both comedic and dramatic journey with Ben to discover what he decides and why he does so.::Anonymous
